moves.2... d5 3. Bd3 a6: I've never understood this move...  What gain?
moves.4. c4: Queens Gambit?  (I call this "Three Pawns deffence / attack")
moves.5. e5: I think I'll start a pawn push.
moves.5... Bb4+ 6. Bd2 Qe7: Good move!  If I initiate a bishop exchange, his Queen can take b2.  I could play b3, or

moves.12. Qa4: pin his Knight and cover b4.
